overview:
Peter Meng is an experienced entrepreneur that has been part of 5 startups and is on his next venture. His experience and expertise lies in small business ownership as well as Fortune 500 sales and marketing (Apple, Home Depot). He is spent most of his life in Missouri working in the Higher Education industry, and continues to leverage his background and strengths in his latest venture, LearningWeb.

One of Peter’s greatest strengths is idea generation for anything Internet. When given enough raw information, he can produce a useful, money making idea. Peter has grown his reputation by helping others develop of business models, strategies, and tactics, to allow them to find the resources to execute ideas.
